javadoc: {@link FileSystemBrowserPlugin} utility methods that other things might find useful.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the {@link ProgramManager} associated with this fs browser plugin.

When this FS Browser plugin is part of the front-end tool, this will search for an open CodeBrowser tool that can be used to handle programs.

When this FS Browser plugin is part of a CodeBrowser tool, this will just return the local ProgramManager / CodeBrowser. @param tool The plugin tool. @param allowUserPrompt boolean flag to allow this method to query the user to select a CodeBrowser. @return null if front-end and no open CodeBrowser, otherwise returns the local CodeBrowser ProgramManager service.
methods.name: getProgramManager
methods.comment:
Returns the ProgramManager associated with this fs browser plugin.
 
 When this FS Browser plugin is part of the front-end tool, this will search
 for an open CodeBrowser tool that can be used to handle programs.
 
 When this FS Browser plugin is part of a CodeBrowser tool, this will just return
 the local ProgramManager / CodeBrowser.

params.name: allowUserPrompt
params.comment:
boolean flag to allow this method to query the user to select
 a CodeBrowser.

return.comment:
null if front-end and no open CodeBrowser, otherwise returns the local
 CodeBrowser ProgramManager service.

name: FSBUtils
